sections.text: Kellogg’s MBA develops courageous, collaborative leaders through a team-based, experiential curriculum with deep analytical and strategic foundations.

items: Core in accounting, economics, finance, leadership, strategy, operations, and marketing
Majors and pathways (e.g., Data Analytics, Entrepreneurship, Healthcare, Management Science)
Experiential learning: Global Initiatives in Management, Lab courses, and field projects
Career & leadership development integrated across two-year program
sections.text: Students build business breadth through the core, then customize majors and pathways with extensive electives and experiential opportunities.

items: Completion of core and elective credits per Kellogg policy
Application with essays, recommendations, and transcripts
sections.text: Degree completion requires core plus electives; admissions follow Kellogg’s holistic review with required application materials.
Graduates assume leadership roles across consulting, technology, finance, healthcare, and consumer industries with a strong global alumni network.
